titles.title: A bill to provide reduced rates for nonprofit senior citizens organizations.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, US Postal Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Entitles a qualified nonprofit senior citizen organization to the reduced third-class postal rates in effect for other qualified nonprofit organizations.
